required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Performance and Safety of Routine Cataract Surgery With Visiol
clinical_study.official_title: Performance and Safety of Routine Cataract Surgery With Visiol

brief_summary.textblock: In this clinical investigation, the performance and safety of routine cataract surgery with VISIOL will be assessed

primary_outcome.measure: Corneal endothelial cells density in percent
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery Corneal endothelial cells density at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
primary_outcome.description: The variation of corneal endothelial cells density (cells/mm2) as compared to baseline (pre-surgery) will be calculated (%)

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery Corneal endothelial cells area at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: The area (µm2) of corneal endothelial cells will be measured using a non-contact specular microscopy.

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery Corneal endothelial cells density at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: The density (cells/mm2) of corneal endothelial cells will be measured using a non-contact specular microscopy.

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery Corneal endothelial cells regularity at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
Change from pre-surgery presence of keratic precipitate at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: The presence (0 = No, 1 = Yes) of Keratic precipitate will be recorded

other_outcome.measure: A description of keratic precipitates type
other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery a description of keratic precipitates type at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: A description of keratic precipitates type will be recorded

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery central corneal thickness at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: Central corneal thickness (micrometer) will be measured using non-contact specular microscopy

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery corneal oedema at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: Corneal oedema grading will be assessed using a specular microscopy. Gradings will be referred to location of oedema = Peripheral oedema = Central oedema = Generalised oedema

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery intra-ocular pressure at Day 0 (surgery day), Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: Intra-ocular pressure (mmHg) will be evaluated using a Goldmann applanation tonometry

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery intra-ocular pressure peaks at Day 0 (surgery day), Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: The incidence of intra-ocular pressure peaks (≥ 30 mmHg) will be recorded

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery anterior chamber inflammation cell at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: Anterior chamber inflammation will be assessed using slit lamp biomicroscopy (1 mm slit beam). It will be classified based on SUN grading Grade 0 = < 1 cell in field Grade 0.5 = 1-5 cells in field Grade 1 = 6-15 cells in field Grade 2 = 16-25 cells in field Grade 3 = 26-50 cells in field Grade 4 = over 50 cells in field

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery anterior chamber inflammation flare at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: Anterior chamber inflammation will be assessed using slit lamp biomicroscopy (1 mm slit beam). It will be classified based on SUN grading Grade 0 = no flare Grade 1 = faint Grade 2 = moderate (iris/ lens details clear) Grade 3 = marked (iris/ lens details hazy) Grade 4 = Intense (fibrin/ plastic aqueous)

other_outcome.time_frame: Change from pre-surgery BCVA at Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: BCVA will be evaluated using standard ETDRS logMAR chart

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for duration of intervention
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: duration of intervention (min)

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for use of finger grip
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Use of finger grip (yes or no)

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for time needed to remove VISIOL
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Time needed to remove VISIOL (min) counted from the time when intra-ocular lens was inserted until when the aspiration tip is removed

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for volume of VISIOL used
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Total volume of VISIOL used (mL)

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for material of intra-ocular lens used
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Material of intra-ocular lens used (acrylic or silicone)

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for power of intra-ocular lens used
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Power (diopters) of intra-ocular lens used

other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Incision size (mm)

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for energetic parameter power or energy
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Power or energy (% or mJ) during phacoemulsification and photolysis

other_outcome.measure: Intra-surgery information for time of phacoemulsification
other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Time (min) during phacoemulsification

other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: Vacuum (mmHg) during phacoemulsification

other_outcome.time_frame: During Surgery (Day 0)
other_outcome.description: using a 4 point grading scale: ease of VISIOL injection, maintenance of the anterior chamber depth during the capsulorhexis and IOL implantation, ability to remain in the anterior chamber during phacoemulsification and photolysis, clarity of the substance, ease of capsulorhexis, ease of IOL implementation, ease of VISIOL removal and global impression on the product performance during the surgery. Grading scale will be assessed 0 = Not effective = slightly effective = moderately effective = very effective

other_outcome.measure: Global evaluation of the performance by the investigator
other_outcome.time_frame: Surgery day (Day 0) and Day 90
other_outcome.description: Global evaluation of the performance of cataract surgery with VISIOL by the investigator 0 = no improvement = slight improvement = moderate improvement = great improvement

other_outcome.measure: Global evaluation of the performance by the patient
other_outcome.time_frame: Surgery day (Day 0) and Day 90
other_outcome.description: Global evaluation of the performance of cataract surgery with VISIOL by the patient 0 = no improvement = slight improvement = moderate improvement = great improvement

other_outcome.time_frame: Pre-surgery, Surgery day (Day 0), Day 1, Day 7, Day 30, Day 90
other_outcome.description: including their incidence, intensity, seriousness, expectedness and causal relationship with the use of investigational device or study procedure

intervention.description: VISIOL is a 2.0% (m/v) SH viscoelastic solution used for ocular surgery.

study_pop.textblock: Over 18 years cataract patients whom investigator routine considered to treat by surgery with Visiol before recruit to study
